feed.title: DevOps diary
feed.subtitle: Simple blog diary about my learning progress of AWS, Salt, Chef, Ansible and Jenkins. Maybe little bit of security and cooking recepies.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content: Hello everybody, my name is Norbert and I am working as a DevOps / System Integrator. On my daily basis I am working with Kubernetes, Docker, Salt and Jenkins - this is my main stack. However I feel that there is much to improve so I want to learn more about Salt and Jenkins. AWS, Kubernetes and Google Cloud Platform are my second choice. I think that better understanding of these technologies allows me to improve my work and performance. So let’s start togherer! I will describe here all stuff I am learning and what is my progress in it.
